name: One Rule (Oluwapelumi Ayeni, Vasco Almeida)
description:
Instructions: Press the arrow keys when the components are in front of the bin. Don't let them go to waste!

The WebGL Version is a bit wonky, make sure you toggle the full-screen button then press anywhere on the screen.

This was our submission for the Unity Game Jam 2022.

Theme: "One Rule"

We decided to make a rhythm game where the rule was you needed to suck the E-Waste into bins. With the ongoing E-Waste crisis on our planet, we thought this could be a nice way to raise awareness to the problem.
